# Reading

Short summaries of papers, books, and references that inform the lab.

## Reading Note Template

When adding reading notes, use this structure:

```markdown
---
title: "Paper/Book Title"
author: "Author Name"
year: YYYY
category: "Climate Science" | "Energy Systems" | "Risk & Finance" | "Methods"
tags: ["tag1", "tag2"]
status: "read" | "reading" | "to-read"
---

## Summary

Brief summary of key points and findings.

## Key Takeaways

- Point 1
- Point 2
- Point 3

## Connections

Links to related notes, models, or projects.

## Notes

Detailed notes, quotes, and reflections.
```

## Categories

Reading notes are organized by topic:

- **Climate Science** - Physical climate modeling, projections, uncertainty
- **Energy Systems** - Grid operations, renewables integration, storage
- **Risk & Finance** - Climate risk pricing, stress testing, disclosure
- **Methods** - Monte Carlo, time series, machine learning applications
